verses.verse: Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and well <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2204>him,<s%> "You are old and <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years,<s%> and there <S%H7604>remains<s%> yet <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to be <S%H3423>possessed.<s%>
"This is the <S%H776>land<s%> that still <S%H7604>remains:<s%> all the <S%H1552>regions<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and all the <S%H1651>Geshurites;<s%>

from the <S%H7883>Shihor,<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> which is <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H3669>Canaanite;<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> the <S%H5841>Gazites,<s%> and the <S%H796>Ashdodites,<s%> the <S%H832>Ashkelonites,<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittites,<s%> and the <S%H6139>Ekronites;<s%> also the <S%H5761>Avvim,<s%>

on the <S%H8486>south;<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and <S%H4632>Mearah<s%> that belongs to the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%>

and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1382>Gebalites,<s%> and all <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise,<s%> from Baal <S%H1171>Gad<s%> under <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath;<s%>

all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to Misrephoth <S%H4956>Maim,<s%> even all the <S%H6722>Sidonians;<s%> them will I drive <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> only <S%H5307>allocate<s%> it to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as I have commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>"

With him the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5676>them,<s%> beyond the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> even as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> gave <S%H5414>them:<s%>

from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> that is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> of <S%H4311>Medeba<s%> to <S%H1769>Dibon;<s%>

and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and <S%H4602>Maacathites,<s%> and all <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> to <S%H5548>Salecah;<s%>

all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and in <S%H154>Edrei<s%> (the same was <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>); for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>attacked<s%> <S%H3423>these,<s%> and drove them out.

Nevertheless the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H1651>Geshurites,<s%> nor the <S%H4602>Maacathites:<s%> but <S%H1651>Geshur<s%> and <S%H4602>Maacath<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Only he <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%> The <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> are his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he spoke to <S%H1696>him.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> that is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> by <S%H4311>Medeba;<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and all its <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are in the <S%H4334>plain;<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> Bamoth <S%H1120>Baal,<s%> Beth Baal <S%H1010>Meon,<s%>
<S%H3096>Jahaz,<s%> <S%H6932>Kedemoth,<s%> <S%H4158>Mephaath,<s%>
<S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%> <S%H7643>Sibmah,<s%> Zereth <S%H6890>Shahar<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%>
Beth <S%H1047>Peor,<s%> the slopes of <S%H798>Pisgah,<s%> Beth <S%H1020>Jeshimoth,<s%>

all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> with the <S%H5387>chiefs<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H189>Evi,<s%> <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> alse <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> the <S%H7080>soothsayer,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> among the <S%H413>rest<s%> of their <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> was the <S%H1366>bank<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> This was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> to <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%>
and from <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> to Ramath <S%H7434>Mizpeh,<s%> and <S%H993>Betonim;<s%> and from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir;<s%>

and in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> Beth <S%H1027>Haram,<s%> Beth <S%H1039>Nimrah,<s%> <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H6829>Zaphon,<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>'s <S%H1366>bank,<s%> to the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an inheritance to <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%> It was for <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H4266>Mahanaim,<s%> all <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and all the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> which are in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H2677>Half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H6252>Ashtaroth,<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> were for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> even for the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

These are the <S%H5157>inheritances<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> distributed in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

But to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as he spoke to <S%H1696>them.<s%>
